pages.text: $(item)Candelabras$() are one fancy source of lighting.$(br2)They can be lit with a $(item)Flint and Steel$(). When lit, they will repel $(l:bewitchment:creatures/ghost)Ghosts$(), preventing them from going near it, with better materials increasing the repelling effect.$()$(br2)Additionally, Candelabras can be used as wands on $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)Altars$().
